title: Can't get into the game
body:
Hey, so last night I was playing a game, and when I was in loading screen, one of the champions was missing a picture (Morgana), and where her picture was meant to be was a blue square. I then got disconnected from the game because of a file error and had to rejoin. My league was pretty fine from there on until I exited to go for a walk. When I tried to reopen league it said I had corrupt files and told me to patch them. I have being trying to patch them since yesterday but it won't work because I keep getting an "Unspecified Error". Anyone know how I can fix this without having to reinstall an overly large amount? (my internet is awful)

Thanks.

replies.body: I tried repairing my client and I had the same problem "Unspecified error occurred".

Hey UrbanAngel,

You may want to try [**Repairing Your Client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article)!
